conversations: Try going out for a walk or jog to help lift your mood
Stay in touch with friends and family and talk to them when you feel down
Try relaxation techniques like, yoga, deep breathing, or meditation
I'm sorry to hear that. How about trying to write down your feelings in a journal and the challenges you face when feeling depressed
Try to figure out what triggers your anxiety. Jot down in a diary whenver you feel anxious to help see the patterns
Try counting to 10 slowly and repeat, until you feel more calm
Take some time to relax, listen to music, or meditate
Try counting to 10 slowly and repeat, until you feel more calm
Talk to good friends and family who are good listeners
Try to find some time to do any hobbies you enjoy
Try changing your lifestyle by eating more healthy, exercising more
Try putting your phone down and stay away from social media to help settle your mind
